article.title: San Antonio U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the San Antonio U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
San Antonio Office

615 E. Houston Street, Suite 207
San Antonio, Texas 78205
Tel: (210) 472-4020
Fax: (210) 472-4019
San.Antonio.Office.Box@trade.gov

San Antonio Staff

Daniel Rodriguez

Director
Daniel.Rodriguez@trade.gov

Michael Rosales

Senior International Trade Specialist
Michael.Rosales@trade.gov

Oscar Magaña

International Trade Specialist
Oscar.Magana@trade.gov

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​​

​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the San Antonio U.S. Export Assistance Center.
